class gstPlane : public gstSpatialObject

Represents a geometric plane.

Functions
a Returns A coefficient from plane equation.

clonePlane
d Returns D coefficient from plane equation.
error Returns ax + by + cz + d.
intersectPlane Find intersection between a given gstPlane and this one.
perpVec Returns vector perpendicular to point p.
pointOfLineIntersection Given line passing through p1 and p2, intersects plane.
pointOfLineIntersection Given line through p1 and p2, returns TRUE if line intersects plane with point of intersection in intersection argument.
pointOfSegmentIntersection Given endpoints of line segment, p1 and p2, returns TRUE if line segment intersects plane with point of intersection in intersection argument.
pointOnPlane Returns some point on the plane.
printSelf For internal use.
printSelf2 Print to stdout.
project Returns projection of point p onto plane.
projectPoint Returns projection of point p onto plane.
projectPointAlongVector Returns projection of point p onto plane
setD
